item.title: 牛客网 Different Integers
item.author: coldheart
item.description: 牛客网 Different Integers 题目描述 Given a sequence of integers a1, a2, …, an and q pairs of integers (l1, r1), (l2, r2), …, (lq, rq), find count(l1, r1), count(l2, r2), …, count(lq, rq) where count(i, j) is the number of different integers among a1, a2, …, ai, aj, aj + 1, …, an. 输入描述 The input consists of several test cases and
